column5: hey guys, I'm new to the forum, have been a member of OFF for a while and decided to join OFC, i am 15 years old, like to fish for just about anything, wether ice fishing for lakers or drifting for steelhead or popping largies on poppers, i hope to learn a but from you guys and share y experiences as well!
Thanks for the welcome, here are a few photos of my previous fishing experiences:[/url[/url[/url[/url[/url[/url[/url[/url
Welcome BowSlayer. Some nice fish there!
nice.....we'll be coming to you for advice!
lol, ill help with what i can!
